channel.title: Architecture/Design on Pi4J
channel.description: Recent content in Architecture/Design on Pi4J

item.title: Advanced
item.description: Pi4J V2 tries to focus on its core functionality (the GPIO I/O) but at the same time wants to provide the possibility to extend and adapt to other hardware, underlying framework etc. You can find more info on these pages about some of the current functionalities to achieve this:
